content.stem:
Nicky has 4 packs of pencils. Each pack contains 15 pencils. In each pack, 5 pencils are blue and the rest green.

 

Create a bar graph to show how many of each color pencil Nicky has.

 

Click the graph to show where the top of the bar should go.

rubric.name: Rubric
rubric.val:
Exemplar:

 

  • 40 green and 20 blue

 

For this item, a full-credit response includes

 

  • correct bar graph created (1 point).

content.stem:
Nicky tiene 4 paquetes de lápices. Cada paquete contiene 15 lápices. En cada paquete, 5 lápices son azules y el resto son verdes.

 

Crea una gráfica de barras para mostrar cuántos lápices de cada color tiene Nicky.

 

Haz clic en la gráfica para mostrar dónde debe ir la parte superior de la barra.

 

Nicky has 4 packs of pencils. Each pack contains 15 pencils. In each pack, 5 pencils are blue and the rest green.

 

Create a bar graph to show how many of each color pencil Nicky has.

 

Click the graph to show where the top of the bar should go.

rubric.name: Rubric _Spanish
rubric.val:
Exemplar:

 

  • 40 green and 20 blue

 

For this item, a full-credit response includes

 

  • correct bar graph created (1 point).
